languages.text: {n}В глазах темнеет, и мерзкое чувство сковывает грудь. Но вы еще живы и пытаетесь открыть глаза. В дико пляшущих тенях от костра снуют темные фигуры. Одна стоит над вами, весело подбрасывая что-то ... Вы медленно поворачиваете задубевшую шею и исступленно смотрите на культю на месте правой руки. Фигура подходит ближе, отбрасывает замерзшую ладонь на землю и с хрустом отламывает кончик вашего носа. Почему вы не умерли вместе со всеми? Почему еще живы?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Что за хруст? Вы еще живы? В дико пляшущих тенях от костра снуют темные фигуры пришельцев. Одна стоит над вами, весело жонглируя... Стойте, ваше фамильное кольцо! Вы медленно поворачиваете задубевшую шею и исступленно смотрите на культю на месте правой руки. Фигура подходит ближе, отбрасывает ладонь на землю и с хрустом отламывает кончик вашего носа. Почему вы не умерли вместе со всеми? Почему еще живы?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. Dark figures dash about in the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, casually tossing something from one hand to the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах темнеет, и мерзкое чувство сковывает грудь. Но вы еще живы и пытаетесь открыть глаза. В дико пляшущих тенях от костра снуют темные фигуры. Одна стоит над вами, весело подбрасывая что-то ... Вы медленно поворачиваете задубевшую шею и исступленно смотрите на культю на месте правой руки. Фигура подходит ближе, отбрасывает замерзшую ладонь на землю и с хрустом отламывает кончик вашего носа. Почему вы не умерли вместе со всеми? Почему еще живы?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. These are dark figures dashing about the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, happily tossing something from one hand into the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm had been. The figure comes closer, tosses the frozen palm onto the ground and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm had been. The figure comes closer, tosses the frozen palm onto the ground and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的视线变得越来越模糊，胸口有种沉甸甸的感觉，但你还活着，在努力地试着睁开眼睛。黑暗的身影在火焰投下的扭曲阴影中不断穿行。其中一个身影站在你面前，漫不经心地把什么东西从一只手扔到另一只手里……你慢慢地转动着僵硬的脖子，呆呆地盯着一截树枝，那里是你的右臂原本应该在的地方。那个身影朝你走了过来，将一只冻僵的手扔到了地上，并折断了你的鼻尖，发出一声清脆的响声。为什么你没有和其他人一起死去？为什么你还活着？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. Dark figures dash about in the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, casually tossing something from one hand to the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的视线变得越来越模糊，胸口有种沉甸甸的感觉，但你还活着，在努力地试着睁开眼睛。黑暗的身影在火焰投下的扭曲阴影中不断穿行。其中一个身影站在你面前，开心地把什么东西从一只手扔到另一只手里……你慢慢地转动着僵硬的脖子，呆呆地盯着一截树枝，那里是你的右臂原本应该在的地方。那个身影朝你走了过来，将一只冻僵的手扔到了地上，并折断了你的鼻尖，发出一声清脆的响声。为什么你没有和其他人一起死去？为什么你还活着？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu visión se oscurece y sientes una pesadez en el pecho. Sin embargo, sigues viv{mf|o|a} e intentas abrir los ojos. Figuras oscuras corretean entre las sombras proyectadas por las llamas. Una de ellas está delante de ti, cambiándose algo de mano tranquilamente... Lentamente, giras el cuello agarrotado y miras el muñón que queda de tu brazo derecho. La figura se acerca, lanza una mano congelada al suelo y te arranca la punta de la nariz con un crujido. ¿Por qué no has muerto con los demás? ¿Por qué sigues viv{mf|o|a}?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. Dark figures dash about in the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, casually tossing something from one hand to the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu visión se oscurece y sientes una pesadez en el pecho. Sin embargo, sigues viv{mf|o|a} e intentas abrir los ojos. Figuras oscuras corretean entre las sombras proyectadas por las llamas. Una de ellas está delante de ti, cambiándose algo de mano... Lentamente, giras el cuello agarrotado y miras el muñón que queda de tu brazo derecho. La figura se acerca, lanza una mano congelada al suelo y te arranca la punta de la nariz con un crujido. ¿Por qué no has muerto con los demás? ¿Por qué sigues viv{mf|o|a}?{/n}

languages.text: {n}視界が暗くなって、心は無気力感に包まれていた。しかしまだ生きてはいる。目を開けてみよう。炎で映し出されたくねくね動く影の中を、黒い人影がいくつも駆け回る。その中のひとつが目の前に立って、片方からもう片方へと、ニコニコ何かを投げている…硬くなった首をゆっくり動かして、さっきまで右手だった切り株を見つめる。人影が近づいてきて、凍った手を地面に放り投げ、こちらの鼻の先をポキッと折った。なぜ他の奴のように死なない？なぜまだ生きている？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. Dark figures dash about in the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, casually tossing something from one hand to the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}視界が暗くなって、心は無気力感に包まれていた。しかしまだ生きてはいる。目を開けてみよう。炎で映し出されたくねくね動く影の中を、黒い人影がいくつも駆け回る。その中のひとつが目の前に立って、片方からもう片方へと、ニコニコ何かを投げている…硬くなった首をゆっくり動かして、さっきまで右手だった切り株を見つめる。人影が近づいてきて、凍った手を地面に放り投げ、こちらの鼻の先をポキッと折った。なぜ他の奴のように死なない？なぜまだ生きている？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Sicht verschwimmt, und in dir steigt Angst auf. Aber du bist noch am Leben und versuchst, die Augen zu öffnen. Dunkle Gestalten huschen durch die flackernden Schatten des Feuers. Eine davon steht vor dir und wirft lässig etwas von einer Hand in die andere ... Du drehst langsam deinen steifen Hals und starrst stumm auf den Stumpf, wo gerade noch dein rechter Arm war. Die Gestalt kommt näher, wirft eine gefrorene Hand auf den Boden und bricht mit leisem Knacken deine Nasenspitze ab. Warum bist du nicht mit den anderen gestorben? Warum bist du noch am Leben?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. Dark figures dash about in the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, casually tossing something from one hand to the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Sicht verschwimmt, und in dir steigt Angst auf. Aber du bist noch am Leben und versuchst, die Augen zu öffnen. Dunkle Gestalten huschen durch die flackernden Schatten des Feuers. Eine davon steht vor dir und wirft fröhlich etwas von einer Hand in die andere ... Du drehst langsam deinen steifen Hals und starrst stumm auf den Stumpf, wo gerade noch dein rechter Arm war. Die Gestalt kommt näher, wirft eine gefrorene Hand auf den Boden und bricht mit leisem Knacken deine Nasenspitze ab. Warum bist du nicht mit den anderen gestorben? Warum bist du noch am Leben?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre vision s'assombrit, et une terrible prémonition vous serre le cœur. Pour autant, vous êtes toujours en vie et vous vous efforcez de rouvrir les yeux. Des silhouettes sombres se déplacent furtivement dans les ombres mouvantes portées par la lumière des flammes. L'une d'entre elles se dresse juste devant vous et s'amuse à faire passer un objet indistinct d'une main à l'autre... La nuque raide, vous tournez péniblement la tête et posez un regard vide sur le moignon qui vous tenait lieu de bras gauche il y a encore quelques instants. La silhouette se rapproche et jette une main gelée au sol, puis un petit craquement sinistre se fait entendre lorsqu'elle vous arrache le bout du nez. Pourquoi n'êtes-vous pas {mf|mort|morte} avec les autres ? Comment se fait-il que vous soyez toujours en vie ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your vision grows dim and you have a sinking feeling in your chest. But you are still alive and are trying to open your eyes. Dark figures dash about in the twisting shadows cast by the fire. One of them is standing in front of you, casually tossing something from one hand to the other... You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre vision s'assombrit, et une terrible prémonition vous serre le cœur. Pour autant, vous êtes toujours en vie et vous vous efforcez de rouvrir les yeux. Des silhouettes sombres se déplacent furtivement dans les ombres mouvantes portées par la lumière des flammes. L'une d'entre elles se dresse juste devant vous et s'amuse à faire passer un objet indistinct d'une main à l'autre... La nuque raide, vous tournez péniblement la tête et posez un regard vide au moignon qui vous tenait lieu de bras gauche il y a encore quelques instants. La silhouette se rapproche et jette une main gelée au sol, puis un petit craquement sinistre se fait entendre lorsqu'elle vous arrache le bout du nez. Pourquoi n'êtes-vous pas {mf|mort|morte} avec les autres ? Comment se fait-il que vous soyez toujours en vie ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerin kararıyor, göğsünde bir ağırlık hissediyorsun. Fakat hâlâ hayattasın ve gözlerini açmaya çalışıyorsun. Ateşin yarattığı dalgalı gölgelerden karanlık suretler geçiyor. Bir tanesi tam önünde duruyor, bir şeyi bir sağ eline bir sol eline fırlatıyor... Tutulmuş boynunu yavaşça çevirip kesik sağ koluna doğru şaşkın şaşkın bakıyorsun. Suret sana yaklaşıyor, donuk bir eli yere fırlatıyor ve burnunun ucunu çat diye kırıyor. Neden diğerleriyle birlikte ölmedin? Neden hâlâ hayattasın?{/n}

You slowly turn your stiff neck and dumbly stare at the stump where your right arm used to be. The figure comes closer, tosses a frozen hand onto the ground, and breaks off the tip of your nose with a little crunch. Why haven't you died with the others? Why are you still alive?{/n}

Ateşin yarattığı dalgalı gölgelerden karanlık suretler geçiyor. Bir tanesi tam önünde duruyor, bir şeyi bir sağ eline bir sol eline fırlatıyor... Tutulmuş boynunu yavaşça çeviriyorsun ve kesik sağ koluna doğru şaşkın şaşkın bakıyorsun. Suret sana doğru yaklaşıyor, donuk bir eli yere fırlatıyor ve burnunun ucunu çat diye kırıyor. Neden diğerleriyle birlikte ölmedin? Neden hâlâ hayattasın?{/n}
